name: X Pepe
description: $XPe is a community-driven meme token built on X Layer, merging the iconic Pepe culture with the power of the OKX ecosystem. Designed as a decentralized cultural movement rather than just a token, $XPe embodies fair launch principles with no pre-sale, no private placement, and a focus on grassroots growth. With its vibrant community, creative branding, and plans to expand into NFTs, GameFi, and DAO governance, $XPe is shaping a bold new era of meme culture powered by Web3 innovation.
